text.4: =E2=80=A2 Experience with Spark, Hadoop, Hive, Pig etc. Proven expertise with extracting data from a wide variety of sources and transforming the data as needed.
text.5: =E2=80=A2 Proficiency in at least one programming language ( Python/PySpark or Scala) and an expert understanding of SQL. Expert knowledge of relational and non-relational databases.
text.6: =E2=80=A2 Previous experience of dealing with large to very large data sets.
text.7: =E2=80=A2 Be able to communicate collaboratively with Data Scientists and ML Software developers to understand requirements we have and deliver the best in class data solutions.
text.8: =E2=80=A2 Previous experience with statistical modeling and deep learning frameworks / libraries is a definite plus.
text.9: Strong Experience With Databricks, Python Programming
